title: These Are the Best Sale Items at Revolve Right Now
text: Those who know how to shop....shop at Revolve. There, I said it, and I stand by it. The retailer carries more than 1,000 brands—both emerging and well-established designers—and spans fashion, beauty, lifestyle, and home. (Chances are very high that your favorite brands are already sold there.) And the sales? Oh, they’re big. That’s why I’ve dedicated this space to Revolve’s Cyber Monday deals. Scroll on to see the best marked down items to shop before the biggest shopping weekend of the year comes to an end. Best Shoe Deals at RevolveThis is everyone’s favorite part, right? You can never have too many shoes, and I don’t care what Marie Kondo has to say about it. I currently have a pair of warm UGG booties and a Gia Borghini pump in my cart. The editor-loved Glove flat from Mansur Gavriel is also marked down right now. Nike Dunk Low Twist Sneaker Now 40% OffFlattered Carolina BootNow 40% OffZimmermann Morrell Mule 85 Now 30% OffJeffrey Campbell Swanlake FlatNow 30% OffTony Bianco Kiki Clear Vynalite HeelNow 52% OffSeychelles American DreamsNow 29% OffBest Bag Deals at RevolveStocked with favorites like Bella Hadid’s Coach tote and the viral glittery Cult Gaia bag, this section is a treasure trove. I’m holding out hope that Diesel bags will go on sale. Mansur Gavriel Mini Candy Bag Now 30% OffFlattered Tuna Shoulder Bag Now 30% OffLoeffler Randall Ramona Bow Shoulder BagNow 30% OffMarc Jacobs The Canvas Medium ToteNow 30% OffBéis Weekender BagNow 19% OffAllSaints Evaline Fringe Crossbody Now 46% OffBest Gift Deals at Revolve One for me, and one for you—that’s the sound of me getting my holiday shopping done. And Revolve is one of the best places to find gifts and goodies for quite literally everyone on your list, even the dogs and kiddos. Summer Fridays Lip Butter BalmNow 17% OffPiecework L'apero 1,000 Piece PuzzleNow 30% OffBala 3 Pound BarsNow 19% OffLele Sadoughi Gingham Antoinette Bow Barrette Now 45% OffBarefoot Dreams CozyChic Colorblock Throw Now 20% OffThe Skinny Confidential Ice Roller Sleeping Bag Now 18% OffBest Outerwear Deals at RevolveEvery year, come Thanksgiving, I’m reminded of the importance of stylish outerwear. Without it, the world may never know how fashionable you are. Your base layers hardly see the light of day. This season is all about leather bombers, barn jackets, and suede blazers. Ena Pelly Ophelia Wool Shacket Now 35% OffAmanda Uprichard Jackson JacketNow 30% OffGRLFRND Christi JacketNow 6% OffIsabel Marant Etoile Limiza TrenchNow 30% OffAnine Bing Janet JacketNow 40% OffWellBeing + BeingWell Poppy Reversible Puffer Now 75% OffBest Denim Deals at RevolveSplurging on denim feels financially smart to me, and that’s what they call “girl math.” But think about it: It lasts forever, and you wear it all the time. It makes sense to invest in good jeans! AGOLDE Cherie High Rise StraightNow 48% OffFiorucci Baggy Jeans Now 63% OffCitizens of Humanity Annina TrouserAgolde Della Skirt Now 58% OffFree People Amber Denim DressNow 55% OffAmanda Uprichard Braswell Jacket Now 44% OffBest Knitwear Deals at RevolveWhen you think fall and winter, you probably think of sweaters and knits. So, now that we’re talking about it, how is your collection faring these days? Be honest. There are a few ratty pullovers that I, for one, need to let go of. In their place, I will treat myself to something from Revolve’s sale department—potentially from Donni, the brand that makes my favorite kick flare pants. White + Warren Cotton Blend Drop Shoulder Sweatshirt Now 45% Off27 miles malibu Marullo SweaterNow 30% OffCallahan Lyra Top Now 30% OffZemeta Ribbed Soul Asymmetric Sweater Now 40% OffFor Love & Lemons Roxana Cardigan Now 40% OffLovers and Friends Lilah TurtleneckNow 62% OffBest Dress Deals at RevolveWe may be in the dreary December doldrums now, but summer is never far from my mind, so of course I’m keeping an eye out for sundresses and vacation-ready frocks. Plus, there are all those holiday parties and winter weddings to plan for, too...Belle The Label Ballerina Dress Now 40% OffAmanda Uprichard Jania Dress Now 33% OffBardot Malira Shirt DressNow 52% OffNookie Bliss GownNow 35% OffNubyen Columbia Flower Market Skort DressNow 68% OffHelsa The Yasmin DressNow 30% OffBest Accessory Deals at Revolve’Tis the season for hats, gloves, tights, and more. If you’re looking to stock up on trending accessories for the winter, I’d recommend a cozy striped scarf, a chic balaclava, and all varieties of sculptural jewelry. And to all my brides out there, I’m begging you to buy this punk-rock veil. Nike Everyday Plus Crew Socks Now 41% OffB-Low the Belt Alice Now 55% OffIsabel Marant Firny ScarfNow 35% OffGigi & Olive Embroidered Midi Veil Now 38% Off8 Other Reasons Hoop EarringsNow 55% OffSHASHI Hair BowNow 57% OffBest Home Deals at Revolve I’ll keep saying it until y’all really hear me: Revolve’s home and lifestyle departments are second to none. From editor-loved wellness brand HigherDose, to bestselling room sprays, and so much more, don’t miss out on these hidden gems. DedCool Xtra Milk Room + Linen SprayNow 30% OffSlip Queen/Standard Silk Pillowcase Now 29% OffHigherDOSE Infrared PEMF Go-Mat Now 20% OffFurbish Studio NYC Matchbook Watercolor Print Now 19% OffHerschel Supply Co. Heritage Hardshell Medium Luggage Now 35% OffVIitruvi Stone DiffuserMeg (she/her) is the Associate Fashion Commerce Editor at ELLE.com, where she specializes in shopping stories spanning the fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. Over the past three years, she has devoted countless hours to researching brands, testing hundreds (maybe even thousands!) of products, and deep-diving into market and consumer trends. Her favorite job responsibilities consist of co-writing the monthly series Same Same But Different and curating the fashion market for ELLE Escapes. Meg graduated magna cum laude from the Missouri School of Journalism with an emphasis on magazine editing. In 2020, one of her feature stories in the service article category was recognized by the Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication. The year prior, the Society of Professional Journalists named voxmagazine.com “Best Affiliated Magazine” in its Mark of Excellence Awards, when she was on staff. Meg’s stories have appeared on Cosmopolitan, Town & Country, Harper’s Bazaar, and Good Housekeeping, among many other outlets. Her personal passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and gardening. You can find her in New York, where she lives, or on Instagram, where she also lives. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour.
html:
Those who know how to shop....shop at Revolve. There, I said it, and I stand by it. The retailer carries more than 1,000 brands—both emerging and well-established designers—and spans fashion, beauty, lifestyle, and home. (Chances are very high that your favorite brands are already sold there.) And the sales? Oh, they’re big. That’s why I’ve dedicated this space to Revolve’s Cyber Monday deals. Scroll on to see the best marked down items to shop before the biggest shopping weekend of the year comes to an end.

Best Shoe Deals at Revolve

This is everyone’s favorite part, right? You can never have too many shoes, and I don’t care what Marie Kondo has to say about it. I currently have a pair of warm UGG booties and a Gia Borghini pump in my cart. The editor-loved Glove flat from Mansur Gavriel is also marked down right now.

Nike Dunk Low Twist Sneaker

Now 40% Off

Flattered Carolina Boot

Now 40% Off

Zimmermann Morrell Mule 85

Now 30% Off

Jeffrey Campbell Swanlake Flat

Now 30% Off

Tony Bianco Kiki Clear Vynalite Heel

Now 52% Off

Seychelles American Dreams

Now 29% Off

Best Bag Deals at Revolve

Stocked with favorites like Bella Hadid’s Coach tote and the viral glittery Cult Gaia bag, this section is a treasure trove. I’m holding out hope that Diesel bags will go on sale.

Mansur Gavriel Mini Candy Bag

Now 30% Off

Flattered Tuna Shoulder Bag

Now 30% Off

Loeffler Randall Ramona Bow Shoulder Bag

Now 30% Off

Marc Jacobs The Canvas Medium Tote

Now 30% Off

Béis Weekender Bag

Now 19% Off

AllSaints Evaline Fringe Crossbody

Now 46% Off

Best Gift Deals at Revolve

One for me, and one for you—that’s the sound of me getting my holiday shopping done. And Revolve is one of the best places to find gifts and goodies for quite literally everyone on your list, even the dogs and kiddos.

Summer Fridays Lip Butter Balm

Now 17% Off

Piecework L'apero 1,000 Piece Puzzle

Now 30% Off

Bala 3 Pound Bars

Now 19% Off

Lele Sadoughi Gingham Antoinette Bow Barrette

Now 45% Off

Barefoot Dreams CozyChic Colorblock Throw

Now 20% Off

The Skinny Confidential Ice Roller Sleeping Bag

Now 18% Off

Best Outerwear Deals at Revolve

Every year, come Thanksgiving, I’m reminded of the importance of stylish outerwear. Without it, the world may never know how fashionable you are. Your base layers hardly see the light of day. This season is all about leather bombers, barn jackets, and suede blazers.

Ena Pelly Ophelia Wool Shacket

Now 35% Off

Amanda Uprichard Jackson Jacket

Now 30% Off

GRLFRND Christi Jacket

Now 6% Off

Isabel Marant Etoile Limiza Trench

Now 30% Off

Anine Bing Janet Jacket

Now 40% Off

WellBeing + BeingWell Poppy Reversible Puffer

Now 75% Off

Best Denim Deals at Revolve

Splurging on denim feels financially smart to me, and that’s what they call “girl math.” But think about it: It lasts forever, and you wear it all the time. It makes sense to invest in good jeans!

AGOLDE Cherie High Rise Straight

Now 48% Off

Fiorucci Baggy Jeans

Now 63% Off

Citizens of Humanity Annina Trouser

Agolde Della Skirt

Now 58% Off

Free People Amber Denim Dress

Now 55% Off

Amanda Uprichard Braswell Jacket

Now 44% Off

Best Knitwear Deals at Revolve

When you think fall and winter, you probably think of sweaters and knits. So, now that we’re talking about it, how is your collection faring these days? Be honest. There are a few ratty pullovers that I, for one, need to let go of. In their place, I will treat myself to something from Revolve’s sale department—potentially from Donni, the brand that makes my favorite kick flare pants.

White + Warren Cotton Blend Drop Shoulder Sweatshirt

Now 45% Off

27 miles malibu Marullo Sweater

Now 30% Off

Callahan Lyra Top

Now 30% Off

Zemeta Ribbed Soul Asymmetric Sweater

Now 40% Off

For Love & Lemons Roxana Cardigan

Now 40% Off

Best Dress Deals at Revolve

We may be in the dreary December doldrums now, but summer is never far from my mind, so of course I’m keeping an eye out for sundresses and vacation-ready frocks. Plus, there are all those holiday parties and winter weddings to plan for, too...

Belle The Label Ballerina Dress

Now 40% Off

Amanda Uprichard Jania Dress

Now 33% Off

Bardot Malira Shirt Dress

Now 52% Off

Now 35% Off

Nubyen Columbia Flower Market Skort Dress

Now 68% Off

Helsa The Yasmin Dress

Now 30% Off

Best Accessory Deals at Revolve

’Tis the season for hats, gloves, tights, and more. If you’re looking to stock up on trending accessories for the winter, I’d recommend a cozy striped scarf, a chic balaclava, and all varieties of sculptural jewelry. And to all my brides out there, I’m begging you to buy this punk-rock veil.

Nike Everyday Plus Crew Socks

Best Home Deals at Revolve

I’ll keep saying it until y’all really hear me: Revolve’s home and lifestyle departments are second to none. From editor-loved wellness brand HigherDose, to bestselling room sprays, and so much more, don’t miss out on these hidden gems.

DedCool Xtra Milk Room + Linen Spray

Meg (she/her) is the Associate Fashion Commerce Editor at ELLE.com, where she specializes in shopping stories spanning the fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. Over the past three years, she has devoted countless hours to researching brands, testing hundreds (maybe even thousands!) of products, and deep-diving into market and consumer trends. Her favorite job responsibilities consist of co-writing the monthly series Same Same But Different and curating the fashion market for ELLE Escapes. Meg graduated magna cum laude from the Missouri School of Journalism with an emphasis on magazine editing. In 2020, one of her feature stories in the service article category was recognized by the Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication. The year prior, the Society of Professional Journalists named voxmagazine.com “Best Affiliated Magazine” in its Mark of Excellence Awards, when she was on staff. Meg’s stories have appeared on Cosmopolitan, Town & Country, Harper’s Bazaar, and Good Housekeeping, among many other outlets. Her personal passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and gardening. You can find her in New York, where she lives, or on Instagram, where she also lives. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour.
